overview: This film mainly features two friends of the artist. One works in an empty 85-story skyscraper. The other is a student who has participated in left-wing movements and anti-globalization activities for many years. Through these two friends’ situations in life, the work reflects the dreams and illusions of Taiwan during its process of ‘modernization’, and the irresolvable struggle between different national ideologies in local Taiwanese politics.
title: On Going
